snippet: The Franco-Belgian group Dexia, whose shares plummeted 10 percent on Monday, has 4.8 billion euros in credit risk exposure to Greece.
lead_paragraph: The Franco-Belgian group Dexia, whose shares plummeted 10 percent on Monday, has 4.8 billion euros in credit risk exposure to Greece.

headline.main: Belgian Minister Tries to Calm Fears Over Financial Group
headline.print_headline: Belgian Minister Tries to Calm Fears Over Financial Group
headline.seo: Belgian Minister Tries to Calm Fears Over Dexia
